# Today at üé¢ Gimbalabs Playground üé°, we warmly welcome Deep Funding Academy.

![](https://ucarecdn.com/525aaddb-0680-430e-9e83-696922568ba4/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271920%27%20height=%271080%27/%3e)
![Today at üé¢ Gimbalabs Playground üé°, we warmly welcome Deep Funding Academy.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2Fad98ccb0-f4a6-4918-b20c-f93e7b436b9d%2F&w=3840&q=75)

The [Deep Funding Academy](https://deepfunding.academy/) is a fully Community-led initiative, that seeks to educate and safely guide and onboard newcomers into the Deep Funding program and SingularityNET ecosystem.

[SingularityNET](https://singularitynet.io/) CEO, *Dr.Ben Goertzel*, emphasizes the importance of this community-led approach, stating: ‚Äúwe need [Deep Funding](https://deepfunding.ai/) and Community‚Äôs involvement to help us move towards our goal of beneficial and decentralized AGI ***faster and faster***‚Äù.

Don't miss this exciting presentation.

Link invite: <https://gimbalabs.com/calendar>

---

![desc](https://cspot-be.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/1712683477219_image_image.png)

![desc](https://cspot-be.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/1712683477219_image_image.png)

Deep Funding is relying on the üèó learning and contribution infrastructure [Andamio platform](https://www.andamio.io/) provides, to deploy its efforts for a massive onboarding of talented, bold and creative developers and innovators willing to build groundbreaking and cutting-edge technology together.

More details on the Deep Funding-Andamio partnership: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5-b18Xm3iG8&t=136s>
